title: Affordable One Bedroom Apt **Available Now**
posting_body: The Douglas offers spacious and beautiful one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes in the Seattle Heights neighborhood of Lynnwood.
Nearby parks include Scriber Lake Park, Wilcox Park and Sprague’s Pond Mini Park.
Conveniently close to I-5, I-405, shopping, dining, and entertainment, but tucked away in a park-like setting.
This community participates in an Affordable Housing Program monitored by the Washington State Housing Finance Commission (WSHFC).
In order to qualify to live at our community, the total annual income (before taxes) for all occupants of the apartment home must be at or below 60% of the Area Median Income (AMI).
•	Close to Alderwood Mall, I-5 and Public Transit

The person named below has been designated to coordinate compliance with the nondiscrimination requirements contained in the Department of Housing and Urban Development’s regulations implementing Section 504 (24 CFR, part 8 dated June 2, 1988).
The Douglas Apartments is an Equal Housing Opportunity provider and does not discriminate against persons with disabilities.
